# L4: Data Wrangling with dplyr

The package dplyr is really useful for manipulating data.\
We will use five core functions in dplyr: select(), filter(), arrange(), mutate(), summarize(), across().\
In the following two classes, we will get more familiar with these verbs by working through Worksheet A2.

## The Tidyverse

The tidyverse is basically a huge bundle of nice useful packages for data science. All packages share an underlying design philosophy, grammar, and data structures!
